buildCommandDescription: Builds PWA project and packs for SFDC deployment
initCommandDescription: Initializes files and settings for plugin
pwaPathFlagDescription: Relative path to PWA project (folder with PWA's package.json)
sfdcPathFlagDescription: Relative path to SFDC target dir
promptCreateDir: Do you want to create folder? (y/n)
promptRewriteFile: File already exists. Do you want to rewrite it (all contents will be lost)? (y/n)
promptCreateVfTemplate: Do you want to initialize Visualforce template (`vf.template.page`)? (y/n)
